title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The report displays the same results regardless of the dynamic text element's Content Type property setting (Auto, Plain, or HTML).
EB: When setting the Content Type property to Plain, I expect the literal content to be displayed with all tags included. When set to Auto, I expect content 1, 2, and 3 to appear properly without any HTML or RTF tags. Finally, when set to HTML, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without any HTML tags, and content 3 to appear as it is with RTF tags.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Prepare a database field with the following types of content: 
a) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags. 
b) HTML fragments not within <html> tags. 
c) Text with RTF tags. 
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field in a report.
